title: Kunjukrishnan Nadar Memorial Government Arts and Science College
text:
Kunjukrishnan Nadar Memorial Government Arts and Science College, is a general degree college located in <a href="Kanjiramkulam">Kanjiramkulam</a>, <a href="Thiruvananthapuram%20district">Thiruvananthapuram district</a>, <a href="Kerala">Kerala</a>. It was established in the year 1982. The college is affiliated with <a href="Kerala%20University">Kerala University</a>. This college offers different courses in arts, commerce and science. It is the smallest college in India.
Departments and Courses Offered.
The college has five main departments and six sub-departments. The departments are:
Arts and Commerce.
The main courses offered are:
1️⃣ UG Courses
2️⃣ PG Courses
Accreditation.
The college is recognized by the <a href="University%20Grants%20Commission%20%28India%29">University Grants Commission</a> (UGC).
